skill.name: safe_store: Knowledge Graph Operations
skill.description: Building, querying, and managing knowledge graphs with LLM extraction
skill.content:
## Knowledge Graph Patterns
### 1. Graph Store Setup ```python from safe_store import SafeStore, GraphStore
store = SafeStore("graph_base.db")
def llm_callback(prompt: str) -> str: # Logic to call your LLM return response_content
graph = GraphStore( store=store, llm_executor_callback=llm_callback ) ```
### 2. Building the Graph ```python with store: store.add_document("annual_report.pdf") graph.build_graph_for_all_documents(batch_size_chunks=20) ```
### 3. Natural Language Graph Queries ```python result = graph.query_graph( "Who is the CEO of TechCorp and what products do they make?", output_mode="full" ) ```
